title: Production of antibodies against phospholipases A2 from Bothrops snake venoms in tobacco plants
key_findings: Successful production of functional anti-PLA2 antibodies in tobacco plants with demonstrated neutralizing capacity

title: Plant-derived recombinant antibodies for scorpion envenomation therapy
key_findings: Rapid production of neutralizing antibodies in N. benthamiana with comparable efficacy to horse-derived antivenoms

title: Development of broadly neutralizing antibodies against elapid snake neurotoxins
key_findings: Storage-stable antibodies with cross-neutralization potential across multiple elapid species

title: Production of anti-hemorrhagic antibodies in maize seeds
key_findings: Long-term stable antibodies with maintained neutralization capacity after 2 years of seed storage

title: Carrot cell bioreactor production of antibodies against Bothrops snake venom
key_findings: GMP-compliant production system with high expression levels and potent neutralization
